channel.title: Pk server help
channel.description:
Hewo,
I'm going to attempt to make my first sevrer in this case it will be a pking server. The only bad part is, is that I have no idea about java. So i was thinking if maybe I could get together a team, and if u want to help, add me on msn my address is sir_acealot_6594@hotmail.com I will need to assign a certain part of the server to a person who will do a good job. PLeasee message here frist tho so i can have a quick list. Also, if there is any possible way of getting defenders, skill capes, naval outfit, and new items, please let me know.
TY
please help me
TY[br][size=1]Posted at: December 13, 2006, 06:38:57 AM[/size][hr]plz someone help
oh yeah a a question...y does it say everytime i go to open testscape it says ;java; is not a recogonized internal batch.?
